rows.label: qev092001_MSG0001
rows.name: What went wrong? How did I not see it sooner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0002
rows.name: It's so depressing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Alexa what happened.

rows.label: qev092001_JNK0020
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev092001_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Alexa that no matter what
happened, she'll get through it.

rows.label: qev092001_JNK0030
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: qev092001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Alexa if she trashed a Skell.

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0003
rows.name: Thanks, that's sweet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0004
rows.name: If you don't mind listening...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0005
rows.name: Well...yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0006
rows.name: I was testing a Skell weapon, right? Totally normal stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0007
rows.name: Then the prototype starts humming. Then shaking. Then boom![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0008
rows.name: It was a big unit, so the blast was huge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0009
rows.name: The other Skells participating in the test got all jacked up, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0010
rows.name:
And lemme say, the researchers were NOT happy.
It's a miracle no one was hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0011
rows.name:
This was my first time testing something
made by someone other than Tika.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Now I'm wondering if she wasn't carrying me
as dead weight this whole time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0013
rows.name: Honestly, I'm bummed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_JNK0040
rows.name: Assert

rows.label: qev092001_SEL0041
rows.name: Assure Alexa that the explosion was not her fault.

rows.label: qev092001_JNK0050
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev092001_SEL0051
rows.name:
Tell Alexa she'll just have to knock
it out of the park next time.

rows.label: qev092001_JNK0060
rows.name: Challenge

rows.label: qev092001_SEL0061
rows.name:
Ask Alexa if she's really going to
let one mistake crush her spirit.

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0014
rows.name: Yeah, I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0015
rows.name:
I wasn't the one who made the prototype,
and these things happen in tests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0016
rows.name: Still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0017
rows.name:
If there IS a next time.
But you're rightâ€”I can't let this happen again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0018
rows.name: Still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0019
rows.name: It's not crushed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0019_2
rows.name: Just banged around a little. Still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0020
rows.name: I know I caused trouble for everyone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0021
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0022
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0023
rows.name: Man, this sucks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0024
rows.name:
But sitting here moping won't do anything.
I have to tackle this one step at a time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0025
rows.name: And I could use some help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0026
rows.name: That's why you spoke to me in the first place, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0027
rows.name: For starters, let's go apologize to Camber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0028
rows.name: Oh, riiight. You don't know Camber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0029
rows.name:
He heads up a team of four super-talented Skell pilots.
Cool, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0030
rows.name: I always drop by their place and drool over their sweet rides.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0031
rows.name: Seeing all four of them side by side is just...super wow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0032
rows.name: I could just sit there staring for hours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0033
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0034
rows.name: Sorry. Back to the point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0035
rows.name:
It was my fault Camber's Skell got wrecked
and had to be taken in for repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092001_MSG0036
rows.name:
It should be in the administrative district now.
Let's take a look and talk to Camber.[ST:wait ]
